short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is an extension to help suggest how many meal points you should have each day.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
For WashU Students who want to know their suggested meal points balance. 

Has options for:
- custom meal points!
- excluding weekends
- excluding breaks
- meal plan type
- first day at school
- last day at school

Updated for Spring 2024
